Name: Threat Mitigation Policy for ARP Attack
Policy: ?Equipment ssso:hasContext ?loc.                    ?loc rdf:type ssso:Location.                    ?eq ssso:hasContext ?loc.                    ?eq ssso:hasService ?svc.                    ?svc rdf:type ssso:Share_Data.                    BIND (?svc AS ?Disable).                    BIND (ssso:TL-2 AS ?Threat_Level).
Description: Disable all share data services in the location/group, Mitigated Threat Level is TL-2
